EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-01-15 2018 IT Resolutions Send 2.2018 IT Resolutions
EmailTemplate.subject: How are you keeping your IT operations healthy in 2018?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=2018_IT_Resolutions]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
One of the most popular personal resolutions around the offices at Turbonomic this year was to get and stay healthy, so why should we treat IT operations resolutions any differently?
The Turbonomic platform automatically places, moves and scales workloads as demand fluctuates, to maximize performance for your on-premises and public cloud applications.
Click here to learn how Turbonomic can help get your applications into fighting shape in 2018. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resolutions-healthyapps/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=2018_IT_Resolutions]]>
- The Turbonomic Team
